string-array.name: antispikes
string-array.item: This potion will make you immune to\n red bubbles.\n It lasts only for one mission.

string-array.name: glue
string-array.item:
Put this special glue on the ground
 and wait for the treeppets to get stuck
 on it. Be fast, they will get free after
 a while!

string-array.name: earplugs
string-array.item: With these special earplugs musical\n trees will not have any effect on you.\n They last only for one mission

string-array.name: stunning_balls
string-array.item: Three stunning bombs. Hit treeppets\n with them and they will get dizzy\n for a while

string-array.name: springs
string-array.item: These special boots will\n make you jump much higher.\n They last only for one mission.

string-array.name: fast_skates
string-array.item: This add on for you skates will\n increase your maximum speed.

string-array.name: fast_acc_skates
string-array.item: You will get 20% more acceleration\n with this powerful add-on for\n your skates

string-array.name: jetpack
string-array.item: Three charges of fuel for your jetpack.\n You will be able to accelerate and\n jump as you never did before!

string-array.name: snowballs
string-array.item:
Three snowballs containing a
 special freezing potion. Throw them
 at treeppets and they will get frozen
 for a while.

string-array.name: soporific_balls
string-array.item: Three balls containing a soporific\n powder. Throw them at treeppets and\n they will fall asleep for a while.

string-array.name: glasses
string-array.item: These thermo sensor glasses will\n allow you to see treeppets even\n when they are invisible

string-array.name: book
string-array.item:
All the secrets you need to avoid
 ninja treppets attacks! With this you
 will be able avoid flying kicks!
 (Swipe down when attacked)

string-array.name: radar
string-array.item:
This Treeppets Radar will show
 you treeppets position when they
 are out of sight (blinking dots at
 the border of the screen)

string-array.name: engine1
string-array.item: This add-on for you hoover will\n increase its effective range by\n more than 10%

string-array.name: engine2
string-array.item:
With this add on for your hoover
 the time needed to activate the 
 aspiration will decrease by 20%
 (Requires Lightning 1000)

string-array.name: engine3
string-array.item:
The ultimate add-on for you hoover!
 It will increase its range, its speed and
 will allow you to catch more than one
 treeppet at the same time!
 (Requires Turbine 3000)

string-array.name: intro_1
string-array.item: Somewhere in the Solar System,\n not so far from here...

string-array.name: intro_2
string-array.item: The Nursery Ship is finally\n flying back home
Little treeppets are ready to\n hatch from their eggs...
and they are being taken from the\n nursery to Treep planet.

string-array.name: intro_4
string-array.item: Something went wrong with the engine!
The nursery ship needs to make \n an emergency landing on Earth.

string-array.name: intro_5
string-array.item: For safety reasons the load has\n been parachuted to the ground...

string-array.name: intro_6
string-array.item: Once on the ground boxes crack open\n and small treeppets start to emerge...

string-array.name: intro_7
string-array.item: The eggs are not the only thing\n the ship was transporting though...

string-array.name: intro_8
string-array.item: A huge amount of Treeppa was\n in the trunk
Treeppa is the unique source of energy\n of planet Treep...
without it the planet will die.
Unfortunately little treeppets love it\n and will eat it all if not stopped.

string-array.name: intro_9
string-array.item: were hired as a Treeppets Hunter\n to catch all the little treeppets...

string-array.name: intro_10
string-array.item: Find them in these three locations and\n bring them all back to the ship...
so that they can safely return their\n planet once the engine is fixed.

string-array.name: intro_11
string-array.item: Of course baby treeppets were not\n left alone during the trip...

string-array.name: intro_12
string-array.item: Robot Nurses were watching over them.
They are out of control now and\n will not hesitate to attack you.
Especially if they see you bothering\n the babies.

string-array.name: intro_13
string-array.item: Also other things were released\n from the ship...
be constantly ready for strange and\n dangerous encounters...

string-array.name: final_sequence_2
string-array.item: All little treeppets are now\n on board and ready to go.
After a long trip they\n will be back home
All inhabitant of planet Treep\n couldn\'t be more grateful

string-array.name: award_3
string-array.item: Score 50.000 points and\ncatch at least 40 treeppets

string-array.name: award_4
string-array.item: Score 100.000 points and\ncatch at least 100 treeppets

string-array.name: award_5
string-array.item: Score 200.000 points and\n catch at least 200 treeppets

string-array.name: award_6
string-array.item: Complete 20 missions without\n losing any lives

string-array.name: award_7
string-array.item: Hit 10 treeppets in a row\n without missing a shot

string-array.name: award_9
string-array.item: Complete 10 missions with more\n than 30 seconds left on the timer

string-array.name: award_10
string-array.item: Avoid the attacks of\n 20 ninja treppets
